layer_get_all: This function will return an array populated with the unique ID values of each layer in the room.

{ANY_CODE} var a = layer_get_all();
for (var i = 0; i < array_length(a); i++;)
{nbsp_x3}{
{nbsp_x3}layer_destroy(a[i]);
{nbsp_x3}}
The above code retrieves all the layers in a room and adds their ID values to an array. This array is then parsed to destroy or the room layers.
